'''Glacial Waltz''' is [[Kaeya]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|energy frame|55}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet">GenshinAcademy: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iLUT8Tafwih3RZbNlA59w6-x5NQdgPvsMc86b7W92DQ/edit#gid=0 Elemental Burst Frame Tests]</ref>
* {{TalentNote|cooldown frame|49}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet" />
* Glacial Waltz can hit 15 times across the initial burst, icicle rotations and final icicle explosions.
* {{TalentNote|snapshot|Icicle damage|character=Kaeya|talent=Glacial Waltz}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|2|Never-Ending Performance|Glacial Waltz's duration is extended by 2.5 seconds for each enemy defeated during its duration, up to a maximum duration of 15 seconds at three enemies defeated.|character=Kaeya|talent=Glacial Waltz}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Frostbiting Embrace|character=Kaeya|talent=Glacial Waltz}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Glacial Whirlwind|character=Kaeya|talent=Glacial Waltz}}
